Reviewed by the Ministry of Basic, Higher and Technical Education – Instructional Materials Development Center.

©First Edition, 2020 by the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) through the ABC+: Advancing Basic Education in the Philippines Project. ABC+ project is a partnership of USAID and the Department of Education (DepEd) – Ministry of Basic, Higher and Technical Education, BARMM, implemented by RTI International in collaboration with SIL LEAD.
